reviewtext: If you have a device that allows for headphones, but doesn't have a volume adjustment, this is for you.I've been using this to "tone down" the audio that is sent from my Xbox 360's audio dongle. The volume control has lasted well since the purchase, with no visible signs of wear, in spite of being used while traveling. Also, the sound quality is pretty good, with no detectable leakage.I would greatly recommend this.
